0.name: Almond Water (Grey)
0.description: A slightly-worn grey thermos. Slightly sweet with a hint of almond flavor.

1.name: Almond Water (Green)
1.description: A frosted green bottle. Smells like a very sweet energy drink.

2.name: Almond Water (Red)
2.description: A pristine red thermos. Life-saving -- if you can get over the extreme bitterness and fatigue.

3.name: Almond Water (Blue)
3.description: A battered blue thermos. Tastes like the water I remember from the frontrooms.
